com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.vision

Class Contour

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.vision.Image
      • com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.vision.Contour

  • public class Contour
extends Image
    A wrapper class for OpenCV's MatOfPoint and MatOfPoint2f objects.

      • approxEdges

        public Contour approxEdges(double precision)
        Approximates the edges of this Contour.
        Parameters:
        precision - How precise the approximated edges should be. 0.01 is a good number to start with.
        Returns:
        An approximated version of this Contour.
